message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by both of us. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
